Translations.Text: idol worshipers dir Hav DI willed ni ne worship any idols Him nor would our parents Nor would ni prohibit anything His prohibitions. Those antaux them done des sam messengers Can anything do liver komplet message
Ni send messenger cxiu community dir Vi worship DI evit idolatry. Subsequently kelk est direkt per DI while others committed straying Roam ter not consequences rejectors
Ne materi kiel hard vi pen direkt them DI ne direkt des unu Li committed straying Tiel ne 1 help them
Ili jxur solemnly DI "DI testament ne resurrect dead Absolutely such est His inviolable promes plej popol ne kon
Li tiam pint everyone all ajx ili disput let those disbelieved kon ti ili est liars
Al hav anything done ni simply dir al Est gxi est

This est because ili steadfastly persevere en their Lord ili fid
